name: beacon_live_admin
description: Admin UI to manage content for sites built by [Beacon](https://github.com/BeaconCMS/beacon).

scripts.setup: mix deps.get && npm install && cd assets && npm install
scripts.e2e:test: mix assets.build && cd test/e2e && npx playwright install && npx playwright test
scripts.e2e:test:ui: mix assets.build && cd test/e2e && npx playwright install && npx playwright test --ui
scripts.e2e:test:debug: mix assets.build && cd test/e2e && npx playwright install && npx playwright test --debug
